title: Off-peak Friday fares trial to start for Tube and trains in London
description: Off-peak Tube and train fares all day on Fridays will be trialled by Transport for London (TfL) in a bid to boost passenger numbers and support the capital's economy. Sadiq Khan has asked TfL to launch a three-month trial in March. He said the organisation's usage data showed Fridays were quieter than any other week day.
